/* */
SELECT bm.sicode , IFNULL(kr.k_nalja,'') AS k_nalja , IFNULL(kr.k_number,'') AS k_number , bm.m_name , bm.m_code , bm.성별 , bm.m_group , bm.m_regist , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(bm.m_enday, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y.%m.%d') AS m_enday , IF(bm.m_reday = STR_TO_DATE('21000101','%Y%m%d'), '', DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(bm.m_reday, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y.%m.%d')) AS m_reday , bm.m_jumin1 , CONCAT(SUBSTRING(bm.m_jumin1,1,2), '-',SUBSTRING(bm.m_jumin1,3,2),'-',SUBSTRING(bm.m_jumin1,5,2)) AS jumin , bm.m_roomname , bm.등급 AS grade_nm , CASE WHEN bm.배설변의 = '1' THEN '변의장애' ELSE '' END AS cr_state1 ,CASE WHEN bm.배설뇨의 = '1' THEN '뇨의장애' ELSE '' END AS cr_state2 ,(CASE WHEN bm.배설보조 = '1' THEN '인공장루(요루)' WHEN bm.배설보조 = '2' THEN '유치도뇨관' WHEN bm.배설보조 = '3' THEN '기저귀착용' WHEN bm.배설보조 = '4' THEN '도뇨관+기저귀' ELSE '' END) AS cr_state3 , bm.식사종류 , CASE WHEN bm.식사종류 = '1' THEN '일반식' WHEN bm.식사종류 = '2' THEN '죽식' WHEN bm.식사종류 = '3' THEN '유동식(미음)' ELSE '' END 식사종류명 , IFNULL(kr.아침양 , '0') AS 아침양 , IFNULL(kr.아침종류, '0') AS 아침종류 , IFNULL(kr.점심양 , '0') AS 점심양 , IFNULL(kr.점심종류, '0') AS 점심종류 , IFNULL(kr.저녁양 , '0') AS 저녁양 , IFNULL(kr.저녁종류, '0') AS 저녁종류 , IFNULL(kr.오전간식, '0') AS 오전간식 , IFNULL(kr.오후간식, '0') AS 오후간식 , IFNULL(CONCAT(LPAD(kr.아침시,2,'0'),LPAD(kr.아침분,2,'0')),'') AS 아침시간 , IFNULL(CONCAT(LPAD(kr.점심시,2,'0'),LPAD(kr.점심분,2,'0')),'') AS 점심시간 , IFNULL(CONCAT(LPAD(kr.저녁시,2,'0'),LPAD(kr.저녁분,2,'0')),'') AS 저녁시간 , IFNULL(kr.아침시, '0') AS 아침시 , IFNULL(kr.아침분, '0') AS 아침분 , IFNULL(kr.점심시, '0') AS 점심시 , IFNULL(kr.점심분, '0') AS 점심분 , IFNULL(kr.저녁시, '0') AS 저녁시 , IFNULL(kr.저녁분, '0') AS 저녁분 , IFNULL(kr.요양일지, '') AS 요양일지 , IFNULL(kr.일지담당, '') AS 일지담당 , IFNULL(kr.일지코드, '') AS 일지코드 , IFNULL(kr.구강담당, '') AS 구강담당 , IFNULL(kr.구강코드, '') AS 구강코드 , IFNULL(kr.구강상태, '0') AS 구강상태 , IFNULL(kr.구강내용, '') AS 구강내용 , SUBSTRING(bi.아침식사,1,5) AS b_time , SUBSTRING(bi.아침식사,1,2) AS b_time1 , SUBSTRING(bi.아침식사,4,2) AS b_time2 , SUBSTRING(bi.점심식사,1,5) AS l_time , SUBSTRING(bi.점심식사,1,2) AS l_time1 , SUBSTRING(bi.점심식사,4,2) AS l_time2 , SUBSTRING(bi.저녁식사,1,5) AS d_time , SUBSTRING(bi.저녁식사,1,2) AS d_time1 , SUBSTRING(bi.저녁식사,4,2) AS d_time2 , bi.오전간식 AS am_time , bi.오후간식 AS pm_time , bi.구강메모 , '' AS VIEW_MANAGER1 , '' AS VIEW_MANAGER2 , IFNULL(CONCAT(kr.훈련시a, ' ', kr.훈련담당, ' ',kr.기능훈련a), '') AS traning_a , IFNULL(CONCAT(kr.훈련시b, ' ', kr.훈련담당, ' ',kr.기능훈련b), '') AS traning_b , IFNULL(CONCAT(kr.훈련시c, ' ', kr.훈련담당, ' ',kr.기능훈련c), '') AS traning_c , IFNULL(IFNULL(TRIM(kr.미입소),''),'') AS move_cont , IFNULL(kr.시작시간, '') AS 시작시간 , IFNULL(kr.시작코스, '') AS 시작코스 , IFNULL(kr.시작거주지, '') AS 시작거주지 , IFNULL(kr.종료시간, '') AS 종료시간 , IFNULL(kr.종료코스, '') AS 종료코스 , IFNULL(kr.종료거주지, '') AS 종료거주지 , IF((kr.종료시간 > kr.시작시간) && (kr.종료시간 != '' && kr.시작시간 != '') , SUBSTRING(TIMEDIFF(kr.종료시간,kr.시작시간), 1, 5), '') AS timediff , IFNULL(kn.간호일지, '') AS 간호일지 FROM base_mate bm LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM kmrecord WHERE sicode = #{sicode} AND k_nalja = #{date} AND k_code = #{m_code} ) kr ON bm.sicode = kr.sicode AND bm.m_code = kr.k_code LEFT JOIN base_info bi ON bm.sicode = bi.sicode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM kmnurse WHERE sicode = #{sicode} AND n_nalja = #{date} AND n_code = #{m_code} ) kn ON bm.sicode = kn.sicode AND bm.m_code = kn.n_code WHERE bm.sicode = #{sicode} AND bm.m_code = #{m_code}

/* */ SELECT ba.sicode , ba.ac_num , ba.ac_day , ba.ac_name , bm.m_group , ba.ac_code , ba.날씨 , ba.기분 , ba.오전활동1 , ba.오전활동2 , ba.오전활동3 , ba.오후활동1 , ba.오후활동2 , ba.오후활동3 , ba.오전점검 , ba.오후점검 , ba.인지관리 , ba.작성자 , ba.작성코드 , ba.org_ac_num FROM base_actday ba , base_mate bm WHERE ba.sicode = bm.sicode AND ba.ac_code = bm.m_code AND ba.sicode = #{sicode} AND ba.ac_day = #{date} AND ba.ac_code = #{m_code}

/* */ SELECT sicode , so_number , so_nalja , so_code , so_name , 체위시08 , 체위시09 , 체위시10 , 체위시11 , 체위시12 , 체위시13 , 체위시14 , 체위시15 , 체위시16 , 체위시17 , 체위시18 , 담당자08 , 담당자09 , 담당자10 , 담당자11 , 담당자12 , 담당자13 , 담당자14 , 담당자15 , 담당자16 , 담당자17 , 담당자18 FROM base_sore WHERE sicode = #{sicode} AND so_nalja = #{date} AND so_code = #{m_code}

/* */ SELECT sicode , bi.아침식사 , bi.점심식사 , bi.저녁식사 , bi.오전간식 , bi.오후간식 , CONCAT(SUBSTRING(bi.아침식사,1,2), SUBSTRING(bi.아침식사,4,2)) AS b_time , CONCAT(SUBSTRING(bi.점심식사,1,2), SUBSTRING(bi.점심식사,4,2)) AS l_time , CONCAT(SUBSTRING(bi.저녁식사,1,2), SUBSTRING(bi.저녁식사,4,2)) AS d_time , CONCAT(SUBSTRING(bi.오전간식,1,2), SUBSTRING(bi.오전간식,4,2)) AS am_time , CONCAT(SUBSTRING(bi.오후간식,1,2), SUBSTRING(bi.오후간식,4,2)) AS pm_time FROM base_info bi WHERE bi.sicode = #{sicode}

/* */ SELECT sicode , ba_nalja , ba_number , ba_code , ba_name , 목욕시간 , SUBSTRING(목욕시간,1,2) AS sh , SUBSTRING(목욕시간,4,2) AS sm , SUBSTRING(목욕시간,7,2) AS eh , SUBSTRING(목욕시간,10,2) AS em , IFNULL(ROUND(TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(SUBSTRING(목욕시간,7,5),SUBSTRING(목욕시간,1,5)))/60),'') AS minute , 제공방법 , ba_memo , 담당자01 , 담당코드01 , 담당직종01 , 담당자02 , 담당코드02 , 담당직종02 , org_ba_number , 등록일시 , 등록자 , 수정일시 , 수정자 FROM base_bath WHERE sicode = #{sicode} AND ba_nalja = #{date} AND ba_code = #{m_code}

/* */
SELECT sicode , kmnumber , kmdaily , kmcode , kmname , km바코드 , km직원명 , km직원코드 , km제공시간 , km저장일시 , km평가 , org_kmnumber FROM kmdaily25 WHERE sicode = #{sicode} AND kmdaily = #{date} AND kmcode = #{m_code} ORDER BY km바코드, km직원명

/* */
SELECT sicode , k_nalja , k_code , k_name , 요양일지 FROM kmrecord WHERE sicode = #{sicode} AND k_nalja BETWEEN DATE_SUB(#{k_nalja}, INTERVAL 5 DAY) AND DATE_SUB(#{k_nalja}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND k_code = #{m_code} ORDER BY k_nalja DESC LIMIT 1

/* */
SELECT sicode , k_nalja , k_number , k_code , k_name , 아침양 , 아침종류 , 점심양 , 점심종류 , 저녁양 , 저녁종류 , 오전간식 , 오후간식 , IFNULL(CONCAT(LPAD(아침시,2,'0'),LPAD(아침분,2,'0')),'') AS 아침시간 , IFNULL(CONCAT(LPAD(점심시,2,'0'),LPAD(점심분,2,'0')),'') AS 점심시간 , IFNULL(CONCAT(LPAD(저녁시,2,'0'),LPAD(저녁분,2,'0')),'') AS 저녁시간 , IFNULL(아침시, '0') AS 아침시 , IFNULL(아침분, '0') AS 아침분 , IFNULL(점심시, '0') AS 점심시 , IFNULL(점심분, '0') AS 점심분 , IFNULL(저녁시, '0') AS 저녁시 , IFNULL(저녁분, '0') AS 저녁분 , 구강담당 , 구강코드 , 구강상태 , 구강내용 FROM kmrecord WHERE sicode = #{sicode} AND k_nalja BETWEEN DATE_SUB(#{k_nalja}, INTERVAL 5 DAY) AND DATE_SUB(#{k_nalja}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND k_code = #{m_code} ORDER BY k_nalja DESC LIMIT 1

/* */
SELECT sicode , kmnumber , kmdaily , kmcode , kmname , km바코드 , km직원명 , km직원코드 , km제공시간 , km저장일시 , km평가 , org_kmnumber FROM kmdaily25 WHERE sicode = #{sicode} AND kmdaily = (SELECT MAX(kmdaily) FROM kmdaily25 WHERE sicode = #{sicode} AND kmdaily BETWEEN DATE_SUB(#{k_nalja}, INTERVAL 5 DAY) AND DATE_SUB(#{k_nalja}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)) AND kmcode = #{m_code} AND km바코드 IN ('SC0100','SC0200','SC0300','SC0400','SC0500','SC0700','SC0900','SC1000') ORDER BY kmdaily DESC,km바코드, km직원명
